page.title: 04SOCIAL CARE in RHAYADER
page.content: 'Sheltered housing' for the eldery is provided by the social services on 3 sites: Maesyderi, Maesynant and Brynheulog. Hafan Home also provides accommodation for 8 residents.Meals on Wheels, cooked at the primary school, are delivered by voluntary helpers twice weekly. A Luncheon Club provides a dinner once a week to anyone who wants to attend. There is also a Day Centre at Llandrindod Wells, 12miles away, which Rhayader people attend once a week. Children from the age of 8 are able to attend a Youth Club which provides various games and activities. The area does not have any ethnic minorities,neither are there many social divisions. A Voluntary Services Co-ordinator was appointed in April 1985 to bring together all the voluntary services.
